pregunta: Me estoy reuniendo con ella en la estación
respuesta: I am meeting her at the station
incorrecta1: I met  her at the station
incorrecta2: I would meet her at the station
incorrecta3: I will meet her at the station

respuesta: I have met her in Hawaii
incorrecta1: I had met her in Hawaii
incorrecta3: I have meet her in Hawaii

pregunta: Lo conocí cuándo estaba en la universidad
respuesta: I met him when I was in college
incorrecta1: I have met  when I was in college
incorrecta2: I had met  when I was in college
incorrecta3: I have meet  when I was in college

pregunta: La conoceré el año que viene
respuesta: I will meet her next year
incorrecta1: I would meet her next year
incorrecta2: I'm going to meet her next year
incorrecta3: I will met her next year

pregunta: Me voy a reunir con ellos después de trabajar
respuesta: I'm going to meet them after work

incorrecta2: I would meet  them after work
incorrecta3: I'm going to met  them after work
